Find matching pairs of fruits while avoiding bombs! You have 90 seconds to earn as many stars as you can. How to play: • At the start of each level, the cards are shown for 2 seconds – try to remember as many as possible before they flip over. • Tap cards to reveal them – select two to see if they match. • Matching pairs stay uncovered; mismatched ones flip back after a moment. • Watch out for bombs! Hitting one will cost you 10 seconds. Bonuses: • Earn a star for every correctly matched pair. • Gain an extra 30 seconds for completing a level.

Repeat the shown sequence of colored buttons! You have 90 seconds to earn as many stars as you can. How to play: • At the start of each round, a sequence of buttons is shown – each one has a unique color and sound. • After the preview, repeat the sequence by tapping the buttons in the same order. • If you make a mistake, the sequence will replay automatically. • The timer pauses during the preview and runs only during your turn. Bonuses: • Earn a star for every correctly repeated sequence. • Gain an extra 15 seconds for completing a level.

Select numbers whose sum equals the displayed result! You have 90 seconds to earn as many stars as you can. How to play: • Tap number buttons to select them – purple means selected. • Choose the required number of buttons to check your answer – a correct combination turns gray permanently, while an incorrect one flashes red and resets after a moment. • Some levels include extra cards that are not needed to reach the target sum. Bonuses: • Earn a star for every correctly found sum. • Gain an extra 20 seconds for completing a level.

Guide the balls to the goal by adjusting the track! You have 90 seconds to earn as many stars as you can. How to play: • Balls appear from the bottom right corner – your task is to guide each one to the hole of its color. • To change the track's path, tap the blue switches. • You must plan ahead! The game's tempo gradually increases – balls appear and move faster and faster. • A ball falling into the wrong hole costs 5 seconds and breaks your combo. Bonuses: • Earn a star for every ball that reaches the correct hole. • Gain extra time for streaks of correct hits – the bigger the combo, the bigger the bonus!

Find words hidden in the letter grid! You have 90 seconds to earn as many stars as you can. How to play: • At the top of the screen is a list of words to find on the board. • To select a word, swipe your finger across the letters, forming a straight line. • Words can be arranged horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. • A correctly found word is crossed off the list and permanently highlighted in color on the board. • Remember, the selection must be a straight line – trying to curve the line will reset your selection. Bonuses: • Earn a star for every word found. • Gain an extra 20 seconds for completing a level.

React with the correct gesture to the appearing symbols! You have 90 seconds to earn as many stars as you can. How to play: • Watch the track – it has a queue of circles; you must react to the bottom symbol. • Each symbol requires a different gesture (tapping a specific side, both sides, the symbol itself, or not reacting at all). • Perform the gesture before the symbol disappears. The time to react is limited and gradually gets shorter! • A wrong reaction (or lack of one) costs you 6 seconds and breaks your combo. Symbols and gestures: – tap the side with the same color – tap the left side – tap the right side – do not touch – tap here – tap the opposite color – tap the left side twice – tap the right side twice – tap both sides at once Bonuses: • Earn a star for every correct symbol. • Gain extra time for correct reaction streaks – the bigger the combo, the bigger the bonus!
